Description:

Years have passed since the Saints 3rd Street took himself Stilvoter. 
This is not an ordinary street gang, and a real brand shoes, energy drinks 
named after himself and Johnny puppets GETA with bobble head, which sells every store nearby.

Saints - Kings Stilvotera, but their celebrity status has not gone unnoticed. 
The Syndicate, a legendary criminal fraternity with his men across the globe, 
drew attention to the Saints and is now demanding tribute. Not wanting to kneel 
before the Combine, you're driving fighting in Steelport, once famed metropolis, 
which has become now the city of sin under Syndicate control.

Dump the tanks with air, order air strikes by Mexican gang wrestlers 
and protect themselves from the military-trained, using a toy for sex, 
kindle the urban warfare that will put all Stilport reared in the wild 
story ever invented for the game. Fasten seat belts.

Features:

Sin City. Tear from the hands of the Syndicate trade in weapons, 
cyber-crime and prostitution. Learn all the secrets Stilporta where 
life does not stop for a minute. 
Weapons of retaliation. Not only defeat the enemy, it must be humiliating. 
Ogreyte adversary club in the form of a phallus. 
Need to go crazy together. Jump naked parachute, landing in a burning car 
and head to your partner in a suicidal race to meet the brothel Syndicate. 
Initiation Station. Create the most ridiculous characters who have seen the 
light of disheveled celebrities to bare pirate-ninja. Inside every sinner 
has a Saint.
